_sText:
ZE_SORRENTO_ESCAPE - BY ROGER GARGANTUA 
Version : V5 ( ze_sorrento_escape_v5 )

This is my third map. I believe this is the first escape map which has Italian styled environment and buildings. Named it after Sorrento, an Italian coastal village near Napoli where my mother used to live. Easy name to remember....
But it's construction is inspired upon Scheveningen. A coastal town in Holland with a huge pier and boulevard. But I thought it would be nice to have an Italian styled environment in an escape map since they are more exciting to build then Dutch buildings. 

Features:
* 64 spawnplaces
* 5 different routes to the end
* including 1 SECRET route
* 3D-Skybox
* My trademark: 
   a building which holds grenades and guns

Special thanks to:
- i3D.net for their great servers and because I am admin on it 
- Salem from i3D for putting up my maps and being a great support
- Skaelman for helping and solving my 3d-skybox problem
- Many others, including the people I see in servers and on my Steam friendlist

ROGER GARGANTUA 

aka GARGANTUA[i3D]

Map changes in version 5 ( ze_sorrento_escape_v5 )
- Less barrels 
- higher crates at seadome tower
- minor changes here and there

ze_sonic_contamination_v1_Incomplet

***********
This is the incompleted version 1 of the sonic contamination, created by me and Thomasddq. To get the completed version, you can visite my siteweb http://www.nfaith.co.nr/ (and soon on the Mapocalyps Siteweb). 

But what is the difference of the incompleted version and the completed?
Well , in the completed you got sonic models and in the incompleted, instead of the model you got some picture. Because, by the rules of fpsbanana and the big ***** on the beta 3, we can't post it on fpsb, so on this siteweb there will be only the sonic model free version.

***********
Hint:
Some walls aren't walls, and computers can be usefull

***********
Author:
Sardox (me) - Gameplay Mapping
Thomasddq   - Detail Mapping (I want to thks him a lot because without him you would got such little detail.)
Pqnix       - Texture (The grass)

Thanks:
Fighter111  - For giving us the idea.
Deathrunisbest - The beta 3 testing, and good feedback

***********

Orignal v1 here - http://www.gamebanana.com/maps/156657

Zombie escape map designed for max interaction between players.

V2 Edits.

PLayer Clipped areas where people would use props to climb up then shoot the prop away.

Player clip before the escape "vehicle" that breaks on a timer, stopping people climbing up on to the escape "vehicle" rather then going inside like planned.

Quickly added sounds for the nuke.

This map is based around defending at jump points with 64 unit jumps.

For no block servers ONLY
For servers running default jump hight (64 units max)


Any bugs then please let me know.

This is my map that I've created, it's not like most escape maps, there isn't loads of running.
I saw that atix panic was well liked and I believe it's because there is always loads of action.
I found maps with loads of running were just boring and you didn't get much action between humans and zombies, so whats the point ?

Basically there are 6 holding points at the start of the map, you must defend them and wait for the escape doors to then break.
After this you must travel to the roof, prime the escape lift and set off the nuke all the time whilst defending against zombies to which there are breakable blockades and moving floors just so all the zombies can get to the end and hopyfully make it action packed.

Problem I saw with atix panic is people stuck in props !
After the escape doors break there is a timer that turns on trigger_remove, this will remove any physic props touching this brush, therefore freeing the zombies stuck inside giving them a chance to make it to the end.

The fps in tests have been 260-500 so I hope this will be fine on a server.
I did want a 3d skybox with displacment but this affected fps more then I expected and it's better to have a map that performs well then one that perfroms badly so had to miss it for now.


Map compailed on "normal" with cubemaps working.

ze_shroomforest1

 Taskuvaras created this map.
He allowed me to fix every glitches, and do some modifications

What is Fixed and New
  • All glitches from Ext3
  • And on some others levels
  • Particle with the fix nomenclature (custom_particle_...)
  • Optimised entity count
  • Added a Warmup
  • Added a new level unlocked after you win Ext3. You can choose it in Admin Room during the Select Level.

Feature
  • 9 Special Items (+2 used to advance in the map)
  • Musics
  • Packed Entwatch config
  • 7 Levels (8 if you count the Level Selection round)

Changelog 4.2 --> 4.3
  • Player getting stuck in elevator part of lvl2 will get teleported once you reach the boss
  • Ext2 laser, are now 1/3 Crouch and 2/3 Jump (source randomization is so bad, and that should make the end of the level a little easier)
  • Fixed one cooldown in Entwatch config (Mines was 2 sec instead of 3)
  • Last Level, if zombie pass the line while the grid is closing, it wont trigger the Win

Changelog 4.3 --> 4.4
  • CT who fall from the elevator for no real reason (maybe doorhug), get teleported back in the elevator
  • Fixed a glitch during boss1
  • Added trees from Shroomforest2 during the level7 (i couldnt remove the Level2 tree from the skybox like I wanted, so dont take attention to that detail during the last level)
  • Renamed the level7 (???) to "A new beginning"
  • The congratulation level (after the level7) is a quick zm mod in Shroomforest2 spawn
  • Fixed mine cooldown in Entwatch config again (4 seconds to be sure it dont waste one mine)

Changelog 4.4 --> 4.4fix
  • Forgot to pack the boxes (red error in the Shroom2 spawn, after you beat the map)
  • I Didn't pack the correct entwatch cfg (wrong Ammo id and Ultima cooldown)
  • The tree is now killed when you reach Shroomforest2 spawn (thanks .george)
  • "EXTREME MODE" instead of "EXTREME MOD"

Changelog 4.4fix --> 4.5



  • Removed the packed cfg. All commands are executed by the map.
  • Admin Room: Replaced a old texture of music with the correct one
  • Item: The freeze sound of the mines is not anymore dependant of the Ice (it wouldnt play if Ice wasnt spawned)
  • Lvl2: Fixed missing texture under the elevator
  • Ext2: Fixed ghastly attack stopped completly with gravity trick
  • Ext2: Fixed the message "DITTO IS USING TRANSFORM" when boss is dead
  • Ext2: Water now go down faster after boss death
  • Ext3: Made doors, elevator kill if you try to block them
  • Ext3: Added an animation for Satan's laser
  • Level7: Elevator grid open faster to make the cover a little harder
  • Level8: Fixed "Quick ZM Mod" with "Quick ZM Mode"
  • Level8: Added a new music during that mode (Donkey Kong Barrel Blast - Jungle Level 1)

  • __________________________________________________________________
  • This is the final version. There wont be more Update
  • Ask me on Steam or PM me here if you need the vmf for a csgo port
  • __________________________________________________________________

ze_shroomforest_v4_5: http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/186471

Update: v4.1
- Created a new ending, the previous was too hard to defend.

Update: v3.4
- Modified the end slightly.


Update: v3.3
- Some spots would not get hit by the nuke, fixed that.
- Modified the end slightly to increase the chance the survivors wil.. survive.
- Removed the push triggers at door 5.


Update: v3.2
- Modified the spot you have to defend at door 3 a bit so that the survivors also stand a chance there :).


Update: v3.1
- I noticed that in some servers the physics went crazy, and therefore I have added another way to get past the physics-bridges.


Update: v3
- In some servers the infection starts after 30 seconds, which was too long for the previous version of this map. In this version, I've added some more running to the start of the map, so that the map will now also be fun in servers with a longer time before the first infection.

I didn't remove the v2 from FSPB because it is still playable. This version can be used in all servers, but I have made it especially for servers that have set time until first infection to 30 seconds.


Update: v2
- Changed the end of the map. It was too hard to defend and you could get hit by the nuke even when inside the area.


To start with, this map is not about the looks, but about the gameplay. I can't guarantee you that it will be fun, but I sure hope so. My intention was to create a map in which the survivors have to defend and run. I tried to make the spots that they have to defend not too easy to get into by the zombies. Therefore the defendable spots on the way to the end should be fairly easy to defend. The end should however be balanced :). If you find any bugs, please report them to me. Also if you have any comments, feel free to leave them here :).

v11

  • ADDED BACK TRUCKS

Bring on The Worlds End!
========================

### The random possible routes
Spawn > Office/Boat/Underground > Trucks/Sewer > Rooftop/Cellar escape

B3
--
- Added in another route (alternative to trucks)
- Optimization improvements at boat
- Fixed missing textures on planks
- Pub entrance barricade adjusted
- Added sprites to set of buttons

B2
--
- Added in underground route
- Elevator doors kill
- Water push trigger raised
- Tweaked roof top ending
- Added another hold point at The Winchester

Features
--------
- 5 Random routes
- 2 Random endings
- 4 Useable filtered weapons (Shovel/Cricket Bat/Rifle/Molotov)
- No extreme mode or boss fights

I will update this map again when valve sorts out their cubemaps.

ze shaun of the dead, is to celebrate the 2012 blue-ray release

-----------------------------------------------------------
### b1 FIX

- Fixed trigger that was filtered incorrectly
- Fixed doors in the cellar

### b1

- Increased thickness of the cellar's lifts doors

### a5

- Zombies can no longer ride on the back of the ct truck
- Helicopter now comes in faster
- Teleport added to stop players from getting stuck in the bridge
- Fix spot where player could escape spawn before they should be able to
- Hopefully this time particles should be fixed

### a4

- Trigger push added to trucks to help protect ct
- Boat fall out issue revised (tell me if people still fall out)
- Lock barricade made more ct friendly
- Fixed missing particles

### a3

- Missing textures added

This is a very basic version of a map i do hope to improve in the near future.

- 2 random routes
- 2 random endings
- 4 usable weapons (all filtered)
- 3d skybox, particles and cubemaps

Future plans are to make use of the underground area in the map. You can noclip there if u like.

note: this map contain a few zombie pusher triggers that may upset some players. Sorry.

For the millions of mgs fans around the world, this ones for you!
Shadow Moses Island in Alaska's Fox Archipeligo was attacked and captured by next generation special zombies being lead by members of Foxhound! Escape from the docks all the way past the communications tower to Metal Gear Rex's lair and activate his railgun to kill the zombies!

This is just alpha, to see ppl's initial impressions feedback. I still need to optimise it, and i realise there's overflow. I started work on this about a year ago and gave up after i couldnt optimise it, if i can't this time ill let the community do it, if they want. Before you critise the textures for perhaps being ugly and low res, you might want to bear in mind that this is based on a ps1 game, and i wanted to evoke a ps1 era atmosphere. In this updated version i improved the commanders room and changed the snow texture and i'll try to optimise it soon if i can.

A map i made based on metal gear solid 1. Designed for ze servers

(DONT RENAME THE MAP FILE! IT MIGHT CAUSE ERRORS)



V2_1 CHANGES:

working for new ob
bugs fixed
new holdspot at generator
enhanced atmosphere
new awesome stargate activation effect!
have fun with this version and post feedback plz!


Story:
Mission Abydos:
After having a zombie infection on stargatecenter you have to make your way to the gate room, activate the stargate and flee through it. the "time tunnel" is also called hyper space and its no time travel lol). Having reached abydos you have to get some C4 outside the pyramid. while you run back into the pyramid and plant the c4 the others have to cover your back at the entrance until the door closed. Then you rush back into the catacombs of the pyramid until you get back into the gate room with daniels stone tablett and escape with the ring transporter system to a save goa uld mothership.

Mission Stargatecenter:
The Zombie race is coming through the gate. To hold them back you try to close the iris but it doesnt hold them off long. Run into an elevator and make your way til the generator where someone has to jump in and overheat it by this. Officially he dies by jumping in but you "respawn" as a survivor in another room where the others have to free you. with you the replicator disruptor :). Run faster and get outside by repairing the final elevator before the whole complex explodes.

Weapons:

SGC Mission: Replicator disruptor
Damage: 200 per second
Lasts: 2 seconds
Special: backboost for zombs
Cooldown: 20 sec
Usage: rightclick

Abydos Mission: Zat nikitel
Damage: NONE
Lasts: 5 seconds
Special: Stun for zombies
Cooldown: 20 sec
Usage: rightclick

Features:

- 2 incredible missions with special weapons and high detail.
- nice fps
- radar
- 64 spawns
- 2 separate spawns of which one divides into 2 again. so very nice balance at start.
- missions activate randomly every round.
- 1:1 stargate dialing sequence as in the movie.
- working ring transporter system as in the movie.
- usable zat
- usable replicator disruptor
- and pretty more stuff like many custom models etc.

Have Fun.

Greetings

FreeZe

**ze sewer escape__final_jbg**

- fixed nuke glitch
- various small changes
- added new ending section
- optimized

ZE_SEWER_ESCAPE_FINAL

This escape map is located in and around a sewer plant.

____________________________

Features

Random Traps - Each round the traps will change, this will make each round different.

Unique Ending - There is two different endings for the same escape, it just takes two alternate routes to the same ending. When near the end one of the routes will be randomly picked.

64 Spawns

Cubemaps

____________________________

*** FINAL UPDATES 2 ***

- Fixed Nuke Glitch

*** FINAL UPDATES ***

- Alterations at two sections of map to look different and balance the gameplay more

- Made visual alterations on the buttons and ladders

- Fixed players been glitched into floor and walls by the lift

- Fixed the light models so they look like they are on

- Clipped off camping spots

*** V8 UPDATES ***

- More Balanced

*** V7 UPDATES ***

- Added another route to the side tunnels at spawn

- Increased the strength of the gates at the spawn

- Increased the strength of the other gate

- More optimization

- Increased strength of the boards at the lift

- Made the wall near the lift break a bit faster so humans have a bit longer to set up barricade

*** V6 UPDATES ***

- Added different props at the lift to barricade with

- More Optimized

- Added more strength to the gate

- Added some more detail in places

- Added some more props at the end points to make better barricades with

- Player cliped parts that would get players stuck

*** V5 UPDATES ***

- Replaced first gate at spawn with a door, their is a button next to which opens the door. This change should help with the balance of the map

- Made the lift a little bit more faster

- Fixed doors getting stuck on dropped weapons

- Added a gate on the train so people cant get on untill the train is ready to go

- Added a gate at the back of the train for when the window route is used, this will stop zombies jumping to train and then going inside the train holding the game up

- Removed the trigger hurt from the train track and replaced it with trigger push

- Changed some parts of the map a little

*** V4 UPDATES ***

- Added a extra gate at the start

- Reduced the amount of time at the end to defend from 1:20 to 1:00

- Increased the speed of the lift a little

- When underground at the end, a message will display telling you a few seconds before the trains leaves to get on the train.

- Removed the second door on the train and moved it to the back of the train.

- When above the train at the end, you will see a message telling you when you can jump to train from window.

- Added a secret to get a extra prop to barricade with at the end area with the window.

- Added some more detail to the map

- Blocked of any camp spots in the spawn

- Removed a set of planks from each tunnel at the start

- Spaced out the spawn places so each tuneel gets more of a equal amount of players, but you dont have to go down the tunnel you spawn near

- Added a message that says when the gate before the car jumping has been closed

*** V3 UPDATES ***

- Made the windows easier to get through

- Fixed the issue with people camping at the start and zombies not been able to get back to spawn, they now can

- Added some new parts to the map to help balance it out, added a gate that can be closed which can be broke after a number of hits. This can be used to slow down the zombies when been chased.

- Added some fences to the car jumping part, this will stop zombies been able to just ingnore jumping on the cars and just going through the slime and getting humans very easily

- Added a meesage that states when the lift is leaving

- Added a extra route to one of the ending of the map to help and encourage the zombies to attack more at that certain point

*** V2 UPDATES ***

- Changed Lift to func_tracktrain, this stops people from killing other players by jumping on heads.

- Fixed map messages not showing up.

ZE_SEWER_ESCAPE_2012_B1

- Few optimization tweaks
- Visual changes/tweaks
- Major changes at two of the final endings
- Other minor stuff
If you want to create new version of this map, then contact Xquality for more info.

Hi, this is an experimental SCP map made for SIBGamers.net Mapping Contest # 1.

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

This map has two levels:

The first is the familiar simple level of zombie escape, in which you need to run to the room and wait for the door to close while firing back at the zombies.

The second - I made the second level as similar as possible (with assumptions) to the gameplay of the game "SCP Containment Breach".

At this level, each CT player can escape from the laboratory, as well as help others.

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Conditions for opening Gate A:

_________________________________________________________________________________

Compliance order is important!

First, the computer must be powered up (control room in the "offices" zone).

The second should be a conversation with a computer (room in a "heavy zone").

_________________________________________________________________________________

Conditions for opening Gate B:

_________________________________________________________________________________

The order of compliance is not important!

A conversation with a computer should be conducted (room in a "heavy zone").

You must turn on the power to Gate B in the genset (genset room in the "light zone" zone).

_________________________________________________________________________________

_

Conditions for activating Alpha warheads:

_________________________________________________________________________________

The order of compliance is not important!

The first thing to do is to turn on the power of the computer (control room in the "offices" zone).

You must turn on the power to the generator room (generator room in the "light zone" zone).

_________________________________________________________________________________

How SCP_173 works:

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

For SCP_173 to work: the plugin that comes with the map must be added!

SCP_173 kills CT_team players by touching it!

SCP_173 has an increased movement speed of 1.75!

As soon as the CT_team player looks at SCP_173, he stops!

The functionality of the plugin for SCP_173 uses the "Blink" time interval when the player "Blinks" SCP_173 can move regardless of the vision of other players!

The plugin for SCP_173 has many settings, you can customize it for your server. (Read Readme_PLUGIN_ConVar).

____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Roles:

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

At the second level, players are assigned to roles based on the total number of spawned players!

Possible non-critical problems with the player distribution system ...

It is also possible that the player does not clearly understand what role he has.

Role of "Security" - Guard the people!

You have to protect people from SCPs and zombies, you know! they are not armed until they find a weapon.

-You appear with a weapon.

-You have the opportunity to send people from the laboratory WITHOUT delay (Button near the elevator)!

The role of the "scientist" - Survive!

-You appear in the "offices" location

-You appear unarmed.

-When escaping from the laboratory, the delay in sending players is 15 seconds!

Role of "Class_D" - Survive!

-You appear in the "light zone" location

-You appear unarmed.

-When escaping the laboratory, the delay in sending players is 15 seconds!

__________________________________________________________________________________________________________

Item 3: Dark

Okay yet another release of this map. Now its version 6. Dang you people and your glitch finding abilities! Lol. Anyway this time added much bigger heli so it takes off proper and added more custom content, including 4 player models as dead npc's from the upcoming Halo:Source mod (Link here ). Anyway added some new traps and most importantly added another alternate route to the top of the buildings! So if you miss the heli you still can go through the emergency door located at the back of the heli area, you cant miss it, the door has radiation signs all over it =-p. Anyway if you find any more bugs or glitches plz pm me and I will either put up a patch here, or if its HUGE, ill make another new version o_0... Old Post: Okay so after extensive bug testing and testing it online I have decided to realese this version of runaway. This version fixes several bugs and glitches such as: -Water not rendering -Being able to glitch of map at gas station -Being able to glitch of map at back buildings -House with steps now has breakable wall (old one wasnt cliped far enough) -Filled in empty glitch spot for nuke -Ect This version also includes several new enhancments such as -Alternate heli board point! -Several new secrets -Removed easy buttons and placed harder ones so prevention of secret spammers -Uberkirsche gun prefab as a secret -Hidden wall door -Ect. So hopefully this version will be much better with way fewer bugs to be found. Hope you like the new content (if you can get to it =-p). Original post from old, old map: Finally got this finished. It includes rogergargantua's original map runaway2 (link: here) and extended it and added a secret room, which you can see in one of the screenies. Anyway added a heli and everything, few custom sounds ect. Please dl and put it on your servers! BTW I had gargantuas permision for this map. Just so you know. For people with fast dl servers, the .bz2 files go on your fast dl server while the normal .bsp goes on your server.

Ze_rooftop_runaway2_v3 - By ROGER GARGANTUA

Sequal map of Rooftop Runaway 1! This map continues where Rooftop Runaway 1 ended. 
I'm planning to make a third Rooftop map, which will end this series and thus will be the final chapter.

** UPDATE 22/03/08 **
- Escape door is higher
- A radio to call for airstrike instead of keypad. It closes door within 10 seconds now instead of the 20 sec that it was before.
- Moved the escape ramp to the left side and made it a lot smaller. A lot easier to shoot zombies off.
- Replaced the boxes at the end escape point.
- different lighting ( changed settings in the light_sun entity ). It now has more of a sunset light.
- Added one secret spot which has some grenades lying. 

Story: After you and your military team got away with the train ( ze_rooftop_runaway 1 ) you arrived at the city's trainstation. Some roofs at the station have collapsed because of the airstrike and the trainrails are now blocked. You have no choice now but to go back in to what's left of the city and get to the secure high grounds. 

Objective: You are part of the military and your objective is to get back into the city. The only way to be safe is to make way via the rooftops to get to the highest building. There you can call in for an AIRSTRIKE and blast the place back to hell.
Good luck, marine!

Credits: 
Hero in a Dream (For helping me on several occasions with maptesting)
i3d.net (For their big support and they have the best servers)

ADDITIONAL INFO
* 64 spawn points.
* Working escape bunker.
* Airstrike that blasts away everything except for the survivors in the escape bunker.
* Not only the zombies are the danger in this map.....but you also have to face big heights.
* approximately 3 weeks building time to make this map.
* NORMAL compiling ( compile time : 1h 30 mins ).
* Secret room.
* Cool combat area : "Industrial buildings".
* Multiple ways or subroutes.
* Heavy map, you better have a fast PC.
* fog controller with z-plane 3000 in a try to give less fast PC's a good fps aswell.

Have fun!!

Roger Gargantua

ROOFTOP RUNAWAY - Made by Roger GARGANTUA

My first map! 

*UPDATE 21 MARCH* 
- Time before door open is extended to 80 seconds. I added more time so there's more room for epic battles at the end. Time before train leaves is now 15 seconds instead of 20 sec.
- Replaced the boxes at the escape door more closer towards the door. I hope it creates a more stable defence.
- Escape door is bigger and wider ( no more stuck people, headstanders, blockers, etc. ).
- little texture fixes,etc. 


Story 
The "virus" has finally reached the city. People started getting infected quickly and they turned into flesheating zombies. The military has been sent to make an end to the infection but they have failed. There's no stopping.....

Objective 
You are part of the military and your objective is to get out of the city. The APC's crashed but your team got message there's a functioning train waiting on the other side of the street. However, one member got infected and it's unclear which member it is. It's too dangerous to walk via the streets so make use of the rooftops which are the fastest way to the get-away-train. There you can call in for an AIRSTRIKE and blast the place to oblivion.
Good luck, marine!

Credits: 
Hero in a Dream (For helping me on several occasions with mapping and maptesting)
NightMare (maptesting)
i3d.net (For their big support and they have the best servers) 

ADDITIONAL INFO
* 64 spawn points
* Working escape train
* Airstrike that blasts away everything except for the survivors on train
* Not only the zombies are the danger in this map.....but you also have to face big heights
* 3 weeks building time to make this map
* Fast compiling ( the light is pretty bad, I will run it later with normal or expert compiling )


Have fun!

ROGER GARGANTUA

a ze map set place in a rollermine factory^^

features:

cubemaps (even though you cant see them that much but you still can a bit) 

lots of different kind of rooms like: labs, storage room, waste room etc

teleporters with sound effects

twisted surprise at the end ^^

and WTF BOOM sound when map is being nuked :D

changes in v2:

adde a another way in the box room

map now supports 64 players

doors now have 30 seconds delay on them so you now have to hold off the zombies

changed a texture which seemed to not be working as it kept changing from black to texture

changes in v3:

fixed the buttons to look better


Changes in v4


added 4 more ways to get up on the boxes in the box room

rounded some corners in the parking lot area. (see screenshot)

made the map change mp_roundtime to 7

added a couple of decals here and there


changes in v5


made that when you fall down in the first room you will teleport back to the start so that the first zombie doesnt keep dying the first minute

varied the console commands and also added commands when the doors opens

made the glass in the room with the 3 doors with 30 seconds delay stronger so it will be easier to defend


changes in 2010

improved the graphics

optimised it abit

modified some holding points for better balance
